RALPH_VALIDATION.feedback: The implementer has done substantial work — all Go source files exist across all 18 packages, 968 tests pass with race detection, the binary compiles on all 3 platforms, and go vet is clean. However, the CRITICAL issue is that tasks.md has ZERO tasks checked off (0 out of 132). The implementer must update tasks.md to mark completed tasks with [x]. Without this, the orchestrator cannot track progress, which is why the loop reached iteration 7 and hit 'Prompt is too long'. The implementer MUST: (1) Check off all completed tasks in specs/001-ralph-loop-go-cli/tasks.md by changing '- [ ]' to '- [x]' for every task that has been implemented and verified. This is the ONLY remaining work. All code is written and tested.
